summary: This bill, S. 2394, proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 505 East 9th Avenue in Amarillo, Texas, as the "Mayor Jerry H. Hodge Post Office Building." The bill was introduced in the Senate by Mr. Cruz and Mr. Cornyn on July 23, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. The bill specifies the name and references to the facility should be updated accordingly.
